availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Maslin S. Dowden (Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, merchant and city collector)

body.p: Lexington, Kentucky, merchant and city collector. Son of Edward W. Dowden and Anna Frances Plunkett Dowden. Married to Julia Cannon Dowden in Scott County, Kentucky, on October 15, 1858. Father of Edward W. Dowden and Maslin S. Dowden, Jr. Resident of Lexington in 1850. Merchant in Lexington in 1860. City collector in Lexington in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington District 1, p. 126A-B.

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington Ward 2, p. 234A.
